The vvorkes of Edmond VValler, Esquire, lately a member of the Honourable House of Commons in this present Parliament Works. 1645 Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.
[3], 111 p.
Printed for Thomas Walkley, London : 1645.
In verse and prose. First ed. Cf. DNB. "Imprimatur Na. Brent. Decem. 30. 1644" Reproduction of original in Huntington Library. "Mr. VVallers speech[es] in Parliament": p. 93-111.
